pullRequest.title: GG-31021 Fixed uninformative message in console about using deprecated active()

commit.message: GG-31021 Fixed uninformative message in console about using deprecated active()

nodes.bodyText: Let's use ClusterState.INACTIVE here instead of hardcoded enum instance name.
There's also ACTIVE_READ_ONLY state. Don't you think that we should also mention it here?

GG-31021 separate lines fix message for ReadOnly mode
